purpose: The email announces the 7th International Workshop on Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems (FMAS 2025) and invites submissions.
evidence_sentences: FMAS 2025 is a 2.5-day peer-reviewed international workshop that brings together researchers working on a range of techniques for the formal verification of autonomous systems.
FMAS welcomes submissions that use formal methods to specify, model, or verify autonomous systems; in whole or in part.
